customer_addr:

Jackson, NJ 08527

citations.narrative:
Upon arrival, brown paper was observed across the windows along the entire front of the store. Additionally, a large
yellow sign was taped to the front door indicating that the store was moving soon and listed the new address. Painters,
who were painting inside of the store, told the Aphis Official that the owner moved away in July 2023.
The licensee failed to notify Animal Care about the change of address in less than 90 days nor did they obtain a new
license before this change of location.
A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before any change in the name,
address, management, substantial control or ownership of his business or operation, locations, activities, and number or
type of animals described in paragraph (b)(2) of this section.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: FROM THIS DAY FORWARD (8-23-23)
The exit briefing was conducted with the licensee via telephone call.
Additional Inspectors:
JESSICA GOWINS, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
Upon arrival, brown paper was observed across the windows along the entire front of the store. Additionally, a large 
yellow sign was taped to the front door indicating that the store was moving soon and listed the new address. Painters, 
who were painting inside of the store, told the Aphis Official that the owner moved away in July 2023. 
 
The licensee failed to notify Animal Care about the change of address in less than 90 days nor did they obtain a new 
license before this change of location. 
 
A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before any change in the name, 
address, management, substantial control or ownership of his business or operation, locations, activities, and number or 
type of animals described in paragraph (b)(2) of this section. 
 
TO BE CORRECTED BY: FROM THIS DAY FORWARD (8-23-23) 
 
The exit briefing was conducted with the licensee via telephone call. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
JESSICA GOWINS, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
